pages.text: This block allows you to burn $(l:hexalia:resources/herbs)Herbs$(); to do so, simply input the right combination of herbs and right-click the block with a Flint & Steel. The censer will apply these effects in an area of 16 blocks for a duration of 6 minutes.

pages.title: Fireproof Presence
pages.text: Players within the area will be immune to fire damage during the duration of the effect.

pages.title: Undead Veil
pages.text: Hostile mobs within the area will become neutral to the player and be affected by the Glowing effect.

pages.title: Livestock Comfort
pages.text: Baby mobs will have increased growth rates during the duration of the effect.

pages.title: Anvil Harmony
pages.text: Anvils used within the area will require less experience to operate.

pages.title: Fisher's Boon
pages.text: Increases the fishing luck of players within the area.

pages.title: Suction Zone
pages.text: Items in the area will be attracted to the player, and if there is a Windsong placed in the area, it will be moved to a Hopper instead.
